titleStmt.title: Epicoene, or the silent woman A comedie. Acted in the yeare 1609. By the children of her majesties revels. The author B. I.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, and are to be sold by Iohn Browne at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
